review_text: Best Guide For Grow Your YouTube Audience

I've enjoyed the course, though it was long, it felt you have covered all subjects, so thank you. Your language and videos are clear and easy to grasp. The quality of the videos, sounds, and screen shares were made very professionally. As a beginner, it sure helped me to gain confidence & a better understanding of what to do next. Tnx again. Price was a fair trade.
Got stuck at module 5. Kept getting an error message.
A solid overview of the merger between marketing and YouTube, especially for beginners.
I'm hoping the rest will be just as valuable.

What made it really hard for me to grasp all this highly interesting and informative content on going live on YouTube is Phil's voice. He must have overused it and in combination with Video School Online's microphones, it's just exhausting to listen. He should let this asian guy Sam talk more. What I miss are recordings of the actual deployment process which is fairly easy on YouTube due fewer resolution restrictions like on other platforms, where 1280 x 720px quality is often mandatory.

Awesome! Full of useful details. This is perfect for everyone specially those starting on YouTube.

I want to thank all of you who worked on creating this course, I honestly was really impressed by the content, the clarity and the amount of details provided. I will go over this course multiple times because is full of jewels... 

Most people have short attention spans now days, and the lessons on this course are short and to the point. Very well done!!!

Do you guys do YouTube channel revisions? (Example: Going to my channel and maybe advise an improvement on a certain area) If you offer that service I am more than willing purchase your services.

Also, the price for this course is very affordable and that is a big plus. Once again, thank you so much, I am very happy with it.
Great course! Learned a lot! Thank you!
It's a great course but a bit outdated.

AMAZING COURSE BUT SOME VIDEO IS VERY OLD LIKE 2018 AND NOW 2021 

MY REQUEST: PLEASE UPDATE THE COURSE
Thanks Phil! Something for YouTube creators in all stages of their journey. No stone was left unturned. Really appreciate how hard you've worked to 'future-proof' this content too. Much obliged.
Very nice describe with details thanks
Really good course, well explained and straight forward to the important points!
